name: YumTable
overview:
YumTable provides hungry diners with last-minute restaurant deals, via the web and mobile apps.

Restaurants can create deals based on time of day or day of week, and promote anything that’s important to them - special produce, discounts, bundle deals to entice diners on slow days, free meal offers to get diners in early.

YumTable began as a subsidiary of Madewell Enterprises, a Melbourne-based technology startup, before being spun out.

At present YumTable is founder funded, with the first outside investor round being available during 2011.
